title: Shaka Wear Men's T Shirt – 2 Pack 7 oz Max Heavyweight Cotton Short Sleeve Crewneck Tee Top Tshirts Regular Big Size S-7XL
description: LONG-LASTING & DURABLE - This high-quality cotton shirt has been constructed to last you a long time. It will last through multiple wash-cycles; it has been preshrunk beforehand to minimize shrinkage after washing and drying, and reactively dyed for long-lasting color. This top continues to keep its shape over time without any stretching or sagging that is common in many shirts. Double needle cover seam stitched on neck shoulder to shoulder tape, sleeve and bottom hem enhances its durability.

2 PACK VERSATILE BASIC - This is the perfect basic t-shirt that every guy needs in his closet. You can dress it up by wearing it under a blazer for formal or business events, or you can dress it down with jeans for an everyday casual style. The seamless tubular body design allows for better fit and comfort for all body types, and with its super max heavy weight material, it makes this perfect for any occasion, from gym workout attire to workwear uniform in medical or construction settings.

AFFORDABLE FASHION STYLE - This essential comes in a classic, short sleeve crewneck style that looks good on anyone. The ribbed knit collar is made with Lycra to maintain tightness. There are multiple vibrant and neutral shades to choose from, making it easy to pick your favorites for daily or professional wear. With quality construction, heavier fabric and longer lasting color, everyone from a police officer or firefighter, to just the everyday man, can find value in this sturdy shirt.

ULTRA-COMFORTABLE - Made with 7 oz. heavy weight 100% cotton (heaviest cotton shirt in the industry), C.Grey: 50/50 Cotton/Polyester, H.Grey: 90/10 Cotton/Polyester, this high-quality essential t-shirt was designed to provide you with maximum comfort. It’s ultra-soft and smooth on the skin, keeping anyone with sensitive skin happy and itch-free. This shirt gives you full range of motion, while maintaining its snug fitting shape during all levels of activity.

Genuine Shaka Max Heavy Weight Cotton Short Sleeve T-Shirt designed in U.S.A. Supplied by Fitscloth. We are greatly confident that you will love Shaka Wear clothing. Please check the SIZE CHART before you purchase.
